main event: A woman observed a glowing reddish-orange UFO in Liberal, Kansas on August 1, 1962.
interesting points: The UFO was described as round and glowing, estimated at 1000 feet altitude,The object was moving in a northeasterly direction at a high speed,The sighting lasted approximately 2 minutes,Initial contacts indicated that others also observed the object,It was reported as leaving a trail and moving erratically.
witness description: a Central Airlines agent and a woman who called in the sighting
